title: How does the present show things that happened in the past? - Quora

response.answer_text: Statues, flags, paintings, photographs, books, and stories. are how the past is shown in the present. When we ban these things, burn these things, tear these things down, history, good or bad, is lost to us. If we forget or deny our history, if we refuse to teach real history, history as it really happened, If we refuse to teach history at all, we are doomed to repeat it. We are doomed to fall prey to anarchists.
